title: Gaza hospital bombing
selftext:
Channel 4 is one that major network in the UK, along with the BBC and ITV.

https://www.channel4.com/news/human-rights-investigators-raise-new-questions-on-gaza-hospital-explosion

Forensic Architecture is a multidisciplinary research group based at Goldsmiths, University of London that uses architectural techniques and technologies to investigate cases of state violence and violations of human rights around the world. The group is led by architect Eyal Weizman. Wikipedia

Earshot is the worlds' first not-for-profit organisation producing audio investigations for human rights and environmental advocacy.
